item.title: Kathy add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Be the change that you wish to see in the world." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Kathy add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Two things are infinite: the universe and human stupidity; and I'm not sure about the universe." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Kathy add a quote by Bessie Anderson Stanley
Kathy add a quote by Jorge Luis Borges
item.description: "I have always imagined that Paradise will be a kind of library." -- Jorge Luis Borges

item.title: Kathy add a quote by Nicolas Chamfort
item.description: "A day without laughter is a day wasted." -- Nicolas Chamfort

item.title: Kathy add a quote by Laurel Thatcher Ulrich
item.description: "Well-behaved women seldom make history." -- Laurel Thatcher Ulrich

item.title: Kathy add a quote by J. D. Salinger
item.description: "Anyway, I keep picturing all these little kids playing some game in this big field of rye and all. Thousands of little kids, and nobody's around - nobody big, I mean - except me. And I'm standing on the edge of some crazy cliff. What I have to do, I have to catch everybody if they start to go over the cliff - I mean if they're running and they don't look where they're going I have to come out from somewhere and catch them. That's all I do all day. I'd just be the catcher in the rye and all. I know it's crazy, but that's the only thing I'd really like to be." -- J. D. Salinger

item.title: Kathy add a quote by J.D. Salinger
item.description: "When you're dead, they really fix you up. I hope to hell when I do die somebody has sense enough to just dump me in the river or something. Anything except sticking me in a goddam cemetery. People coming and putting a bunch of flowers on your stomach on Sunday, and all that crap. Who wants flowers when you're dead? Nobody." -- J.D. Salinger

item.title: Kathy add a quote by J.D. Salinger
item.description: "when you're not looking, somebody'll sneak up and write "Fuck you" right under your nose." -- J.D. Salinger

item.title: Kathy add a quote by Nick Hornby
item.description: "Sarcasm and compassion are two of the qualities that make life on Earth tolerable." -- Nick Hornby

item.title: Kathy add a quote by Nick Hornby
item.description: "A couple of months ago, I became depressed by the realization that I'd forgotten pretty much everything I've ever read. I have, however, bounced back: I am now cheered by the realization that if I've forgotten everything I've ever read then I can read some of my favorite books again <i>as if for the first time</i>." -- Nick Hornby

item.title: Kathy add a quote by Eleanor Roosevelt
item.description: "You wouldn't worry so much about what others think of you if you realized how seldom they do." -- Eleanor Roosevelt
